ygData.subject: Monks wish list
ygData.msgSnippet: K i have been playing a monk for a little while i say this cause im one bub from 12.  What i would like to see: Nunchucks   Couple points more than our fists,
ygData.messageBody:
K i have been playing a monk for a little while i say this cause im one bub
from 12. What i would like to see:

Nunchucks Couple points more than our fists, delay a little longer,
obtainable around lvl 25

Brass knuck Maybe as we are not thugs

Sai (sp) We are following the ways of the mind, but we are a martial arts
type of character. Give them dagger qualities and same delay , only less
weight

Weight Either gives us a couple pounds more or make it so we can make our
money go fron 10 cp to 1 s, 10 s to 1g, 10 g to 1 pp while we are out
running around.

tailoring (not just monk) give ability to make bandages ( monks best
friends).

Our hits should do more damage, maybe not much but am i going to be able to
hit for 128 points of damagae with one fist (not sure on this one cause i
have not attained that lvl sorry).

I don't follow the warriors or much of the other classes for that matter,
but a few more skills and some additions throughout the monks life would
make him a better rounded character ( he is already very fun to play). I
don't think that i out damage to many people in melee yet, that happens
supposedly in our mid range. But i don't want to go over the hill and hit
50 and be back at the bottom of the melee heap either.


Just 2 cents no rants no flames just having some fun with

Shoalin on TZ
